Text: creator of this torrent = genius. DOS games 4 ever!

Just as a note to the creator - I've been playing most of these games and they work fine. However, Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis has a bug. I got pretty far into Atlantis, and every time I tried to fix this robot, the game would either freeze or Indy would disappear. I ended up having to finish the game with an invisible Indiana Jones... which is very hard if you've ever played the end.

I don't know if there is a way to fix that but it was definitely not good. Could be worse but it really scared me, I thought I wasn't going to be able to finish.
I never did finish willy beamish, and the last time I played was around '95.  If someone could seed please I would really appreciate it.
